rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0001
rows.name: Ahh, how Tora missed hot springs...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0002
rows.name:
This bring back memories of first time
we stay in Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0003
rows.name:
The water here is great, right?
It just melted the weariness away.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0004
rows.name:
Ah, I see.
So this is where you stayed...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0005
rows.name:
First time I've been here, though.
But hang on...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0006
rows.name: Is this place unisex?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0007
rows.name:
Sadly, it is not...
Are set times for men and women.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, right...
That sorta system...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0009
rows.name:
Hmph...
Too bad for you.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0010
rows.name:
Seems now is right time for
men to go bathe. What lads say?
We all go, yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0011
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0012
rows.name: What Tora say?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0013
rows.name: All men here! No need to fear nudity!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0014
rows.name: Tora happy to wash everyone's backs!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0101
rows.name:
You want all four of us to
bathe together?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0102
rows.name: Of course yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0103
rows.name: Or, is there some problem?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0104
rows.name:
No, um, me and Rex are game,
but Meleph, uh...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0105
rows.name:
You three go on ahead.
I shall abstain for now.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0106
rows.name:
Meleph so reserved...
Come on, all go together!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0131
rows.name: Come come!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0132
rows.name: No, not resist!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0133
rows.name: No, stop!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0134
rows.name: Cease your tugging!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0107
rows.name:
...Is it possible that Tora doesn't know
Meleph is a woman...?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0108
rows.name:
Well...it's not like I could tell a Nopon
woman apart except from the clothing...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0109
rows.name:
And with Meleph wearing men's clothes,
maybe it's no wonder the little guy got
confused.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0110
rows.name:
Or maybe he just doesn't really care
one way or the other?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0111
rows.name:
Meleph, it okay! Take moment to breathe,
then come with.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0112
rows.name: I refuse.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0113
rows.name:
Look, Tora understand.
Lots of Nopon not like baths, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0114
rows.name: Maybe Meleph afraid Meleph drown?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0115
rows.name:
But hygiene very important! Have to
soak to get nice and clean.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0116
rows.name:
I do like water, and I am not filthy...
But on this matter, I will not budge.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0117
rows.name:
How friend Meleph be so stubborn,
with hot spring right before eyes...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0118
rows.name:
Come on Meleph! Drop clothes
like man and jump in hot spring!
Tora not have all day!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0119
rows.name:
You know I'm a woman,
don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0120
rows.name: Me...me...mehmehmehmeh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0121
rows.name: W-w-w-woman...?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0122
rows.name: Yes. I'm a woman, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0123
rows.name: Meh-meh-mehmehh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0124
rows.name:
Boss! Zeke!
You know this?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0125
rows.name: I mean, at a glance...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0126
rows.name:
Well for Tora, this discovery of century!
Have to tell Hana and others!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0127
rows.name: Well, that's that then, I guess?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0128
rows.name:
My. I did not expect this
when I woke up today.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0129
rows.name:
Hey Meleph, how about next time
you put on a skirt and some heels?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0130
rows.name: How about you die in a fire, Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0201
rows.name:
In return, Tora ask for help in
washing his!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0202
rows.name:
Tora strong believer in importance of
physical contact for build team bonds!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0203
rows.name: I think I'll excuse myself this time.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0204
rows.name: Meleph not want to bathe with Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0205
rows.name: Please don't take this the wrong way.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0206
rows.name:
It is just...this is a very delicate
matter, I'm sure you understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0207
rows.name: Is because Tora is Nopon?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0208
rows.name:
No! Of course not!
That's not it at all!
I, I just, I have other... Ugh...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0209
rows.name: Oh, Meleph...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0210
rows.name:
Why've you gotta be so stubborn?
Why not just play along and make
Tora's little dream come true?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0211
rows.name:
Bolt it!
How dare you make light of me!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0212
rows.name:
Meleph...
Maybe worried about feathers in bath?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0213
rows.name:
Then no need! Tora is young,
not drop feathers so easy!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0214
rows.name: Uhm, no, that's not the problem...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0215
rows.name:
Then there only one explanation...
Meleph really do hate Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0216
rows.name: Nghh... No, that's not true...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0217
rows.name:
Come on Meleph,
Tora's almost crying here.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0218
rows.name: Urkkk...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0219
rows.name:
If Meleph not hate Tora, then why not
want to wash each other's backs...?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0220
rows.name: Oh, for the...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0221
rows.name:
Fine...
Let us bathe together.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0222
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0223
rows.name: Seriously?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0224
rows.name: Tora score!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0225
rows.name:
But I will bathe in my clothes!
And that is non-negotiable!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0226
rows.name:
Uh, good luck trying to explain
this to the bath attendants...
